text: Karakucak wrestling () is a non-oily wrestling specific to Turkish people in Turkey. This wrestling style traces back to the Oghuz Turks. The Men wear pants called "pırpıt".These wrestlings are regularly held as Festival Organization in many Citys of Anatolia, especially in Amasya, Kahramanmaraş, Tokat, Çorum, Sivas, Erzurum, Samsun, Erzincan and Yozgat etc. ==References== Category:Sport in Turkey
title: Karakucak wrestling
